name: dpkg_rpm_package_file_management
description: Install .deb or .rpm packages from files, query package contents

args: if [ '{{pkg_type}}' = 'deb' ]; then dpkg -I {{package_file}}; else rpm -qip {{package_file}}; fi
if [ '{{pkg_type}}' = 'deb' ]; then dpkg -i {{package_file}}; else rpm -ivh {{package_file}}; fi

expected_output.example:
Selecting previously unselected package
Unpacking app (1.0.0)...
Setting up app...

args: if [ '{{pkg_type}}' = 'deb' ]; then dpkg -l | grep app; else rpm -qa | grep app; fi
